page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: WITHIN THE AREA ARE PLACES OF NATURAL BEAUTY. THE WOODED AREA OF LANGDON HILLS IS A POPULAR SPOT AND WAS RECENTLY DESIGNATED AS A COUNTRY PARK, AND EXTENSIVELY DEVELOPED BY THE LOCAL COUNCIL. IN 1981 A NATURE TRAIL THROUGH THE SOUTH-WEST OF THE AREA WAS OPENED AND THIS PASSES THROUGH TWO NATURE RESERVES. PICNIC AREAS WITH SEATS HAVE BEEN PROVIDED ALONG THE WAY, AND THE HOLE AREA IS CARED FOR BY A RESIDENT WARDEN, AND IS PROVING TO BE A POPULAR ATTRACTION FOR BOTH LOCAL INHABITANTS AND VISITORS FROM AS FAR AFIELD AS LONDON.
